API.45: Format invalid in one or more parameters.

API.60: An error occurred while update account.
API.61: Account holder is different from the informed.

API.64: Url S3 document profile is incorrect.
API.59: Url S3 profile picture is incorrect.
API.68: Account %s has not been fully created yet.
API.70: Value must be greater than zero.
API.73: Unable to reverse the debit transaction.
API.85: The destination account tax identifier must be the same as in the origin account.
API.87: phone number does not match with branch/account data.
API.88: person does not match with branch/account titular.
API.105: Card Withdraw not enabled for recipient.
API.111: Operadora fora do ar, tente novamente após alguns minutos
API.120: Boleto payment has been rejected by DDA.
API.122: Maximum Boleto payment date and/or time limit exceeded.
API.123: Maximum Utilities payment date and/or time limit exceeded.
API.308: There is no credit card configuration for the card bin.
API.309: Operation is not valid for this card.
API.691: An account with the given phone number already exists.
API.706: Digital check value (%s) is not the same as the expected one (%s).
API.820: The period between dates is exceeded.
API.960: Account holder registration data is incomplete.
API.981: Internal error when processing the transaction with the acquirer

API.999: Você ainda não possui um token cadastrado. Cadastre agora para continuar a transação.

API.1002: Could not generate a new password at this time. Try again!
API.1003: Could not login at this time. Try again later!

TUTORIAL.TITLE:
Hora de pagar com QR? 
 Siga estes passos pra dar tudo certo:

TUTORIAL.IMAGE2: Para pagar, você pode usar seu saldo na carteira ou seus cartões salvos.

TUTORIAL.IMAGE4: Então ele recebe a confirmação do pagamento e pronto!
